resources.string: The App SafeOnRoad is aimed to make your driving experience safe and exciting. SafeOnRoad is your helpful assistant during the journey. When you push the main button to activate the App, the DO NOT DISTURB-mode will be automatically enabled. You aso can connect your car-bluetooth with the app, then SafeOnRoad will recognize when you are in the car and will be enabled automatically as you start driving.
Channel to send notification, when SafeOnRoad is active
Click SEARCH CAR-ID to find your car
